import React from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {saveInterview} from './actions'; class InterviewsEdit extends React.Component { handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const data = new FormData(e.target); var json_object = {} data.forEach((value, key) => {json_object[key] = value}); this.props.saveInterview(json_object); window.location = "/interviews"; } render() { console.log("inside render") return (

); } } export default connect(null, {saveInterview})(InterviewsEdit) ;
